body_html:
@reedwm you should be able to reproduce it locally... I think I missed the --sync=True flag, make sure you have it and you should see it, sorry.

Also, when running with 1 master, 1 worker, and 1 ps, did you set --num_workers=1 (it's set to 2 in your example above).

Yes, the master counts as one worker as well since it also does training.
